entry.title: Ukraine Steps Up Attacks on Russian Targets in Occupied Territory
entry.content: Kyiv sought to destabilize occupying Russian forces and put them on the back foot as the Kremlin said the attacks were dragging the West further into the war.

entry.title: Russia's Influence Campaign in Africa Targets a U.S. Ally
entry.content: As Americaâ€™s sway across the resource-rich continent has declined, Moscow has stepped up its efforts to boost support, including in Uganda.

entry.title: Xi Jinping Doubles Down on His Putin Bet. 'I Have a Similar Personality to Yours.'
entry.content: The Chinese leader has long admired Vladimir Putin. Now, he is strengthening ties between the two nations with increased trade and energy partnerships.
